content: Hello! This is the XYZ Home Services AI receptionist. I understand you might need HVAC assistance. May I have your name to get started with scheduling?
Nice to meet you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability?
I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you, Margaret. You're within our service area. Could you tell me what kind of HVAC service you need?
I need my air conditioning checked and possibly repaired. The unit isn't cooling well.
Understood. When would be an ideal time for one of our technicians to visit you?
Honestly, I am very busy this month and donâ€™t have time to schedule any appointment right now.
I understand, Margaret. If your schedule opens up later, please don't hesitate to reach out. Would you like me to help with anything else today?
reason: Customer too busy to schedule appointment
